channel.title: Drugs?
channel.description: Have you ever experimented with them? What are your experiences? I personally do not believe in their usage for anything, except maybe medical in dire situations. Also, does anyone here traffic them?

item.title: Drugs?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

To have good acid where you only need 1 blotter for a good trip is very rare these days, and this goes for everywhere in the world. Often the best still takes 2. Some take 4… for a proper trip.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugs?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

I tried LSD on thursday, very fucking cool. The guys I was tripping with snorted some E too, (why they didn’t just take them I have no idea) and they thought we were going to kill each other and we had demons inside us. One of them came at me with a butter knife trying to defend himself but after that things were pretty cool.

Only issue is that one of them was still tripping 24 hours later, I haven’t talked to him since so I don’t know when it wore off.

It was his first time, and the 2 guys took 3 tabs because they thought they were duds after the 1st didn’t work for like 40 minutes. The other guy was fine though. I only had 1 because I knew the guy who supplied them and knew he wouldn’t have dogged us.

We did do a whole lot of nothing though. Ran around the botanical gardens for a couple hours, then went to his house and had what seemed like an adventure just standing around laughing and looking at shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugs?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Mr.Chris:

cocaine is shit, and it’s pretty bad for you. Don’t get hooked - my mates hooked and hes a completely different person compared to a year ago.

I have a friend who was hooked for a year. He was also hooked on ketamine at the same time. In just a few months of stopping, I’d have to say he’s like 100% himself again. You should convince your friend to stop before it’s too late.

I use it sometimes now, but pretty sparingly. Only time I did a lot was during my backpacking trip in South America.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugs?
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Not X A Alex:

I did Zolpidom last night, crazy shit, after this I’m done with drugs for awhile. I took 150 MG of adderall over the course of 2 days, and I wanted to sleep last night I took 10 MG of Zolpidom (Ambiem) about 15 mins into it I was getting tried which it is used for sleep so whatever…

I did 80mg of Zolpidom once. I don’t remember anything after I started coming up on it. I didn’t remember how I got in bed (I was in it backwards, etc.). My brother said I was walkin’ around mumbling and stumbling into him. I don’t remember any of that part haha.

For an 8ball of coke in Jersey, it’s roughly 100-120$ no matter who you get from. It’s usually cut to hell though.
It’s nice when it’s “free” though ;] Especially when you also beat the kid out of 10 tabs of acid.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugs?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Methylenedioxymethamphetamine is the best.

[code]To a well stirred, cooled mixture of 34g of 30% H202 (hydrogen
peroxide) in 150g 80% HCO2H (formic acid) there was added, dropwise, a
solution of 32.4g isosafrole in 120ml acetone at a rate that kept the
reaction mixture from exceeding 40 deg C. This required a bit over
1 hour, and external cooling was used as necessary. Stirring was
continued for 16 hours, and care was taken that the slow exothermic
reaction did not cause excess heating. An external bath with running
water worked well. During this time the solution progressed from an
orange color to a deep red. All volatile components were removed under
vacuum which yielded some 60g of a very deep residue. This was
dissolved in 60ml of MeOH (methyl alcohol – methanol), treated with
360ml of 15% H2SO4 (sulfuric acid), and heated for 3 hours on the
steam bath. After cooling the mixture was extracted with 3x75ml
Et2O (diethyl ether) or C6H6 (benzene). Its recommended that, the
pooled extracts can washed – first with H2O and then with dilute NaOH
(sodium hydroxide). Then the solvent is removed under vacuum to
afford 20.6g 3,4-methylenedioxyphenylacetone (3,4-methylenedioxybenzyl
methyl ketone). The final residue may be distilled at 2.0mm/108-112 deg
C, or at about 160 deg C at the water pump.
Add 23g 3,4-methylenedioxyphenylacetone to 65g HCONH2 (formamide)
and heat at 190 deg for five hours. Cool, add 100ml H20, extract with
C6H6 (benzene) and evaporate in vacuum the extract. Add 8ml MeOH
(methyl alcohol – methanol) and 75ml 15% HCl to residue, heat on
water bath two hours and extract in vacuum (or basify with KOH and
extract the oil with benzene and dry, evaporate in vacuum) to get
11.7 g 3,4-methylenedioxyamphetamine (MDA).

===> To produce MDMA substitute N-methylformamide for formamide in the
above synthesis.
[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Drugs?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:733, topic:160401”]Coke is much too expensive and much too over rated for that little 45 min rush. I can understand mixing it with some other drugs, but taking it on its own is not worth the £50 a g price. Very addictive when you’re on it as well.

This new skunk my friend got makes you feel baaadd in the morning. Shouldn’t be smoking so much of it with exams about either :P[/quote]

Well, don’t forget a gram can get you high like 8-10 times. But yeah, it’s pretty shitty and over rated, and tbh it’s more of a 10 minute rush Theres still some effects for like 30 minutes after, but it’s hardly noticable and you basically feel crappy.

Read full topic

item.title: Drugs?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:728, topic:160401”][quote author=jme link=topic=218296.msg2277024#msg2277024 date=1213499803]

I smoked a few bowls of weed laced with crack last night (I know it was laced because I added it myself). Didn’t get too much of a rush, only lasted for about 15 minutes, then just the normal weed high. I might try smoking some pure crack later this weekend.

Just so you know, to smoke crack you don’t just load a bowl of it into a normal pipe and light it with a flame.

You need a straight shooter/crack pipe. Usually (i think) people put their crack at the end of some steel wool into the crack pipe, and you heat up to wool which vaporizes the crack.
[/quote]
Well that’s what I thought, but my friend just sprinkles a bunch of coke on top of the weed and starts taking hits out of the pipe.[/quote]

That’s a waste of coke. You don’t wanna be smoking non-freebase (crack) coke anyway, especially just on top of weed.

Read full topic
